title.bibl: El Nacional, Feb. 27, 1932. Growth of Old Town Boys' Club

div.bibl: El Nacional, Feb. 27, 1932. GROWTH OF OLD TOWN BOYS' CLUB

body.p: The number of Mexican members of the Old Town Boys' Club has increased to the point where it now constitutes almost fifty percent of the total active membership.
The manual work which the boys of the Club did last year is on exhibition at their club house which is located at 1300 Newberry Avenue.
The public is cordially invited to go there and see this exhibit, of the 17 prizes which were awarded to the boys who did the best work, 8 of these were won by Mexican youths.
